remarks: Extension by continuity.  Theorem 2 of [BourbakiTop1] p.  II.20.  Given an uniform space on a set ` X ` , a subset ` A ` dense in ` X ` , and a function ` F ` uniformly continuous from ` A ` to ` Y ` , that function can be extended by continuity to the whole ` X ` , and its extension is uniformly continuous.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2018.)
